sourcesContent:
<script >
import { ElMessage } from 'element-plus'
export default {
  data(){
    return{
      active:0,
    }
  },
  methods: {
    prev(){

      --this.active;
      if (this.active<0) this.active=0
    },
    next(){
      if(this.active++>3) this.active=0
    },
    sub(){
      this.active++;
      if (this.active=4){

        ElMessage({
          message: '恭喜你！完成密码修改',
          type: 'success',
        })
        this.$router.replace('/ForgotPwd3')
      }
    },
  }
}

const sub=() =>{
  ElMessage({
    message: 'Congrats, this is a success message.',
    type: 'success',
  })
}


</script>
